chara.textHome: Hm? What? Do I need to say something?

Time is valuable to geniuses,
but I'll indulge you just this once.

I'm Touka Satomi.
I'm actually pretty famous, as I've
authored books in the field of astronomy.

My family is in the medical field
so I know a lot about the human body, too!
Let me know if you have any questions!

To learn about the universe is to
advance all of humanity.

In a way,
it's like reading the Akashic Records.

I think sacrifice is a given in
human evolution and Magical Girl history.

Sacrifice is necessary to learn more
about the universe, after all.

I'm one step closer to the end of
46 billion light years!
Am I stronger now?
I was amazing to begin with, so I'm not sure!

My uncle told me to use my talents to
help all people.
I'm trying, but it's kind of difficult.

Papa told me talents have their limit,
so I must reach my greatest potential.

That's why I cut loose anything
that doesn't help me.
I have so much amazing talent, you know!
Ugh, you're late!

You got here after me, so you know
what that means, right?

You have to carry all of my bags
as your punishment!
I'm usually an early riser.
I've got plenty of time before I have to leave.

Hmm, maybe I'll look over the data
from the observatory.
What? I'm eating lunch alone.
The other kids are so boring.

I'm reading my book right now,
so leave me alone.

The probability of people meeting
each other is actually really low.
So our meeting might be fate.
I'm Touka Satomi. Nice to meet you!

I'm reminded of Kyubey whenever the
sun sets and it's time for the
Witches to come out.

I want to ask him more about the universe,
but I doubt I'll see him any time soon.
*Yawn*

Did you know that sleepiness is caused
by proteins in the brain...?
I can't stay up anymore, I'm going to bed.
Give me my teddy bear... Zzz... Zzz...

Would no one become a Magical Girl
if they knew the truth?

Depending on the person,
they might get healthier.
I think there's still some merit to it.
Witch hunting, with you?
Well... How about this?

I'm the brains of our team, so I'll be our
tactician! It's the perfect role assignment,
don't you think?
I don't really want to go into Endless Mirrors.

They copy me in there.
I get creeped out by the thought of
there being two of me.

My dad is the president of
Satomi Medical Group!

That's why we're so rich, and I stayed in
that hospital because it's affiliated.

If your smartphone isn't working,
I can fix it for you.

I don't know how to program it or anything,
but I'm sure I can figure it out.
Shhh! Don't bother me, I'm thinking!

Don't you know that if you interrupt a genius,
you'll be fined 10,000 Yen per second?
What?! No no, there's no one in there!
There's totally no one inside that costume.
You're going to ruin it if you say that!

Our hospital food was really bland,
which makes all food outside the hospital
taste so salty...
I wonder if I'll ever find it tasty again?

Guess what! I'm going to be interviewed by
a local university professor soon!

It won't be open to the public,
but I think it'll get published in a magazine.
You should buy it!

My uncle is actually missing.
We don't know where he is.
He left an unpublished manuscript...
I wonder where he went.

Nemu only ever talks about silly stuff
she's imagined, but she sees reality
and is a lot calmer than me.
That's why I rely on her so much.

If you lose at Rock, Paper, Scissors,
you have to do what I say!

I'm gonna do scissors,
so you have to do paper.
Ready? One, two, three!
It's time for me to have some fun!
I'm so amazing! Hee hee!
Yes, yes! I feel so charged up!
I think we worked hard. Good job.

I won't let anyone stand in the
way of human evolution!

Whoa! Is there a growth hormone or
something for Magical Girls to get stronger?

In terms of being a Magical Girl,
I'm basically a grownup! I'm so strong!

I don't mind telling you about myself,
but you have to give me your future
in exchange!

I want to learn everything there is to
know about the universe.

How it began, what it's made of, everything!
I'm going to know it all one day!
